articles.title: Loneliness Peaks in Youth and Old Age - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A new study revealed a U-shaped pattern of loneliness across the lifespan, with higher levels in younger and older adults and the lowest during middle adulthood.
articles.content: Summary: A new study revealed a U-shaped pattern of loneliness across the lifespan, with higher levels in younger and older adults and the lowest during middle adulthood. The research identified risk… [+6625 chars]

articles.title: Scientists Find a Surprising Way to Transform A and B Blood Types Into Universal Blood - Singularity Hub
articles.description: Surprisingly, the gut microbiome may hold a solution for boosting universal blood supplies by chemically converting other blood types into the universal O.
articles.content:
Blood transfusions save lives. In the US alone, people receive around 10 million units each year. But blood banks are always short in supplyespecially when it comes to the universal donor type O.
